ygData.subject: RE: New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a strength of 120 and stamina of 110.  I get 30 hit points per level (except for level 15 I got 31.  I think it was because I had a +1 to stamina item
ygData.messageBody:
I have a strength of 120 and stamina of 110. I get 30 hit points per level
(except for level 15 I got 31. I think it was because I had a +1 to stamina
item on me.)

At level 20 I had 606 hit points. A level 20 barbarian warrior with the
same strength but 115 stamina had 613 hit points - 7 more for 5 points of
stamina.

To keep this on a bard topic, my bard has 90 strength and 75 stamina :)
Just in case you wanted that info.

Oh and my hit points when I ran into Nixx was 576 not 571.

> ----------
> From: Fun Bob[SMTP:fun-bob@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 11:11 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible
> spoiler)
>
> From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
> If you wouldnt mind telling me, can I ask what your Str and Stam is?
> Rolande
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jones, Brian <brian.jones@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, July 26, 1999 9:25 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spoiler)
>
>
> >From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> >I found the same thing in Paw a couple of weeks ago. There was a dark
> elf
> >necromancer named Nixx Nenix roaming Paw. I was just coming out after
> >successfully defeating Shaman Ren Rex and saw a dark elf swimming. I
> >figured it was another player until he tagged with a damage over time
> (DOT).
> >I made it to the zone before he could catch me and zoned out and the DOT
> >still took me down 3 and 1/2 bubbles of health (I had 571 hit points at
> >level 19).
> >
> >Cwelenas, Minstrel of the 8th Chord
> >Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
> >"Periissem ni periisem"
> >
> >
> >> ----------
> >> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL
> >> G4[SMTP:g4mntofcr@...]
> >> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >> Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 3:35 PM
> >> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> >> Subject: [eqbards] New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible
> >> spoiler)
> >>
> >> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >>
> >> Apologize beforehand for adding to the increasing number of off topic
> >> posts
> >> on this list but I had an encounter last night with a NPC in Highpass
> hold
> >> that I had never seen or heard of before. I was camping the Mucktail
> site
> >> with a level 29 cleric. While we were waiting, we start to see
> messages
> >> scroll through "Cytodl Krish begins to cast a spell". Next thing we
> know
> >> we
> >> get attacked by a high level DE necro. He conned red to me (19 bard)
> and
> >> blue to the 29 cleric. Because we were totally caught by surprise, we
> >> both
> >> had to make a run for the Keep zone. We fully recharged and went out
> >> looking for him. I was singing invis and had elemental and purifying
> >> ryhthms ready to weave. We finally found the necro wandering around
> the
> >> zone, with a bunch of corpses in his wake. We attacked at the cleric
> >> tried
> >> rooting him several times. He kept resisting and the cleric was OOM
> (oops,
> >> I
> >> used an acronym). We had to run to the border again. We recharged and
> >> tracked him down once again. The second time, the cleric just kept
> >> smiting
> >> him and we eventually killed him. All told did over 800 damage to him.
> >> He
> >> didn't drop any loot which was a disappointment. When we killed him,
> the
> >> factions affected, which all got worse, were The Dead, King and Queen
> of
> >> some wierd name, Keepers of the Art, and Eldritch Collective. After
> the
> >> fight, we asked around if anyone had ever seen/heard of this NPC
> before.
> >> No
> >> one in the zone had heard of him. Was wondering if anyone on this list
> >> could shed some light on his background? Also wanted to warn everyone
> in
> >> case they ran into him and they were less level 30 they should be
> prepared
> >> to run.
> >>
> >> BTW, by the way he was acting, almost 100% certain it wasn't a GM
> >> controlled
> >> NPC.
> >>
> >> Galtin of E'ci
> >> CPT Tom Reece
> >> G4 Maintenance Officer
> >> 655-4978
